NVDM.from sentence: 1 ) NVDM : Since NVDM and our proposed Bayesian SMM share similarities , we chose to extract the embeddings from NVDM and use them for training linear classifiers .

SMM.is: non-Bayesian SMM with 1 regularization over the rows in T matrix
SMM.from sentence: 2 ) SMM : Our second baseline system is non-Bayesian SMM with 1 regularization over the rows in T matrix , i.e. , 1 SMM .

ULMFiT.from sentence: 3 ) ULMFiT : The third baseline system is the universal language model fine - tuned for classification ( ULMFiT ) .

TF - IDF.from sentence:
4 ) TF - IDF :
  The fourth baseline system is a standard term frequency - inverse document frequency ( TF - IDF ) based document representation , followed by multi-class logistic regression ( LR ) .
